ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I’m so glad I get to see you again today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s have a
great one!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I found that just lying around near the Trainer
Lodge, so I thought I’d give it to you!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I want you to have
this thing I found!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I hope it’ll be useful to you!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2103_01_10: I’ve been waiting for you! Here, please take this!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
It’s a present to express my gratitude for all
you’ve done for me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’d love to hear what you have to
say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I always look forward to talking with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2302_01_10: This is for me? Thank you!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Wow, thank you so much! This makes me
really happy!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Next time, I’ll bring a present for you, too. You’d
better look forward to it!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! Let’s hang out again sometime!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Thanks for chatting with me! It was really fun!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s have another long chat sometime!
I’ll be waiting!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
It’s so comfortable here, I keep staying longer than
I mean to.
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
When we chat in a relaxed place like this, I find
myself talking about more personal stuff.
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8002_0701_01_10: Where do I like to go cycling?
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Hmm, if we’re talking Unova, I guess it’d have to
be Village Bridge.
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
It feels really nice to cycle across that peaceful,
historic bridge!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Of all the Pokéstar Studios movies I’ve seen, the
one that sticks with me the most is called
Everlasting Memories.
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
It’s a story about a robot that can feel emotions
and the person who created it...
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8003_0701_03_10: Oh no, I’m crying just thinking about it!
ch0101_00_mei_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I hope I get the chance to act in that movie
one day!
